weekly_top_story.headline: Thailand, Cambodia Agree To Renew Ceasefire After Border Clashes
weekly_top_story.summary: Thailand and Cambodia have agreed to renew their ceasefire following a week of deadly border clashes that killed at least 20 people and displaced half a million, easing immediate regional tensions under US mediation but highlighting ongoing Southeast Asian border vulnerabilities.

stories.headline: Iran Detains Nobel-Prize Winner In 'Brutal' Arrest
stories.summary: Iranian security forces detained 2023 Nobel Peace Prize winner Narges Mohammadi and at least eight other activists in a 'brutal' arrest, intensifying crackdowns on dissent and drawing international condemnation amid ongoing human rights concerns.

stories.headline: Germany Accuses Russia Of Cyberattack On Air Safety, Election Interference
stories.summary: Germany accused Russia of a cyberattack on its air traffic control and disinformation campaigns ahead of February's election, escalating NATO-Russia tensions over hybrid warfare tactics despite Moscow's denials.

stories.headline: US Forces Raided Ship Headed To Iran From China In Indian Ocean: Report
stories.summary: US special operations raided a ship from China to Iran in the Indian Ocean last month, seizing military-related items, signaling heightened US efforts to curb proliferation amid rising Indo-Pacific tensions.
